ygData.subject: hate + new favorite mob
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a new favorite mob in the game, new in poh: a haunted chest. Looks like a big box with a lid that has big teeth.  When it attacks it leaps at you, the
ygData.messageBody:
I have a new favorite mob in the game, new in poh: a haunted chest.

Looks like a big box with a lid that has big teeth. When it attacks it
leaps at you, the lid opening and closing like its chomping, it sounds
like someone slamming a trunk lid shot.

The call of "please do not taunt the luggage Tork" had me laughing in RL
after I got chain summoned about 7x in a row. :)

-Tork@Nameless

PS: YES! The footsteps thing is horrible!
